arabicText: قَالَ يَـٰنُوحُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيْسَ مِنْ أَهْلِكَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَمَلٌ غَيْرُ صَـٰلِحٍۢ ۖ فَلَا تَسْـَٔلْنِ مَا لَيْسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلْمٌ ۖ إِنِّىٓ أَعِظُكَ أَن تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
He	said,	“O	Nooh,	he	is	not	of	your	family;	
his	deeds	are	most	improper;	therefore	do	
not	 ask	 Me	 a	 thing	 of	 which	 you	 do	 not	
have	 knowledge;	 I	 advise	 you	 not	 to	 be	
unwise.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Farmāyā	 aey	 Nūh!	 Woh	 tere	 ghar	 wāloñ	
meiñ	 nahiñ	 be-shak us	 ke	 kām	 bade	 na	
lāiq	 haiñ	 to	mujh	 se	woh	 bāt	 na	mang	jis	
ka	 tujhe	 ‘ilm	 nahiñ	 maiñ	 tujhe	 nasihat	
farmātā	hooñ	ke	nādān	na	ban.

arabicText: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أَسْـَٔلَكَ مَا لَيْسَ لِى بِهِۦ عِلْمٌۭ ۖ وَإِلَّا تَغْفِرْ لِى وَتَرْحَمْنِىٓ أَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
He	 submitted,	 “My	 Lord!	 I	 seek	 your	
refuge	from	asking	you	the	thing	of	which	
I	 do	 not	 have	 knowledge;	 and	 if	 You	 do	
not	forgive	me	and	do	not	have mercy	on	
me,	I	would	then	be	a	loser.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Árz	 ki	 aey	 Rab	 mere	 maiñ	 teri	 panāh	
chāhtā	hooñ	ke	tujh	se	woh	chiz	mañgooñ	
jis	ka	mujhe	‘ilm	nahiñ	aur	agar	 tu	mujhe	
na	 bakhshe	 aur	 rahem	 na	 kare	 to	 maiñ	
ziyāñ	 kār	 (nuqsān	 uthāne	 wāla)	 ho	
jāooñga

arabicText: قِيلَ يَـٰنُوحُ ٱهْبِطْ بِسَلَـٰمٍۢ مِّنَّا وَبَرَكَـٰتٍ عَلَيْكَ وَعَلَىٰٓ أُمَمٍۢ مِّمَّن مَّعَكَ ۚ وَأُمَمٌۭ سَنُمَتِّعُهُمْ ثُمَّ يَمَسُّهُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
It	was	said,	“O	Nooh!	Alight	from	the	ship	
along	 with	 peace	 from	 Us	 and	 the	
blessings	 that	 are	 upon	 you	 and	 upon	
some	groups	that	are	with	you;	and	some	
groups	are	those	whom	We	shall	let	enjoy	
this	world	and	then a	painful	punishment	
from	Us	will	reach	them.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Farmāyā	 gayā	 aey	 Nūh!	 Kashti	 se	 utar	
hamāri	 taraf	 se	 salām	 aur	 barkatoñ	 ke	
sāth	 jo	 tujh	 par	 haiñ	 aur	 tere	 sāth	 ke	
kuchh	 	 girohoñ	 par	 aur	 kuchh	 giroh	 woh	
haiñ	 jinheiñ	 ham	 duniyā	 baratne	 deñ	 ge	
phir	unheiñ	hamāri	taraf	se	dard-nāk	ázāb	
pahuñche	ga

arabicText: تِلْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلْغَيْبِ نُوحِيهَآ إِلَيْكَ ۖ مَا كُنتَ تَعْلَمُهَآ أَنتَ وَلَا قَوْمُكَ مِن قَبْلِ هَـٰذَا ۖ فَٱصْبِرْ ۖ إِنَّ ٱلْعَـٰقِبَةَ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
These	are	the	tidings	of	the	hidden,	which	
We	 reveal	 to	 you	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	
Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him);	you	did	not	know	them	nor	did	your	
people,	 before	 this;	 therefore	 patiently	
endure;	indeed	the	excellent	fate	is	for	the	
pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	ghaib	ki	khabreñ	haiñ	ke	ham	tumhāri	
taraf	waḥi	karte	haiñ	unheiñ	na	tum	jānte	
the	 na	 tumhāri	 qaum	 is	 se	 pehle	 to	 sabr	
karo	be-shak		bhalā	anjām	parhezgāroñ	ka

arabicText: وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمْ هُودًۭا ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا مُفْتَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 towards	 the	 people	 of	 A’ad,	 their	
fellow	 man	 Hud;	 he	 said,	 “O	 my	 people!	
Worship	 Allah - there	 is	 no	 other	 True	
God	 except	 Him;	 you	 are	 purely	
fabricators.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	‘Āad	ki	taraf	un	ke	ham	qaum	Hood	ko	
kahā	aey	meri	qaum!	Allāh	ko	poojo	us	ke	
siwā	 tumhārā	 koi	 m’abood	 nahiñ	 tum	 to	
nire	 muftari	 (bilkul	 jhoote	 ilzām	 ‘āaid	
karne	wāle)	ho

arabicText: يَـٰقَوْمِ لَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ أَجْرًا ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِىٓ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“O	my	people!	I	do	not	ask	any	fee	from	you	for	it; my	reward	is	only	upon	Him	Who	has	created	
me;	so	do	you	not	have	sense?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	qaum!	Maiñ	is	par	tum	se	kuchh	ujrat	nahiñ	māñgtā	meri	mazdoori	to	usi ke	zimme	hai	jis	
ne	mujhe	paidā	kiya	to	kya	tumheñ	aql	nahiñ

arabicText: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًۭا وَيَزِدْكُمْ قُوَّةً إِلَىٰ قُوَّتِكُمْ وَلَا تَتَوَلَّوْا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. “And	O	my	people!	Seek	forgiveness	from	your	Lord,	then	incline	towards	Him	in	repentance	-
He	will	send	abundant	rain	from	the	sky	upon	you	and	will	give	you	much	more	strength	than	
you	have	- and	do	not	turn	away	committing	crimes!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	aey	meri	qaum!	Apne	Rab	se	mu’aāfi	chāho	phir	us	ki	taraf		ruju’	lāo	tum	par	zor	ka	pani	
bheje	ga	aur	tum	meiñ	jitni	quwwat	hai	us	se	aur	ziyada	dega	aur	jurm	karte	huye	roo	gardāni	
na	karo

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰهُودُ مَا جِئْتَنَا بِبَيِّنَةٍۢ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِتَارِكِىٓ ءَالِهَتِنَا عَن قَوْلِكَ وَمَا نَحْنُ لَكَ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	“O	Hud!	You	have	not	come	to	us	with	any	proof	and	we	will	not	forsake	our	deities	
upon	your	saying,	nor	will	we	believe	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole	 aey	Hood	 tum	 koi	 dalil	lekar	 hamāre	 pās	 na	 āye	 aur	 ham	 khāli	 tumhāre	 kahne	 se	 apne	
khudāoñ	ko	chhodne	ke	nahiñ	na	tumhāri	bāt	par	yaqeen	lāyeñ.

arabicText: إِن نَّقُولُ إِلَّا ٱعْتَرَىٰكَ بَعْضُ ءَالِهَتِنَا بِسُوٓءٍۢ ۗ قَالَ إِنِّىٓ أُشْهِدُ ٱللَّهَ وَٱشْهَدُوٓا۟ أَنِّى بَرِىٓءٌۭ مِّمَّا تُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“We	only	say	that	you	have	been	severely	
struck	 by	 one	 of	 our	 deities”;	 he	 said,	 “I	
make	 Allah a	 witness,	 and	 you	 all	 bear	
witness	 that	 I	 have	 no	 relation	 with	
whatever	 you	 ascribe	 (as	 partners	 to	
Allah)”-
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hum	 to	 yahi	 kahte	 haiñ	 ke	 hamāre	 kisi	
khudā	 ki	 tumheñ	 buri	 jhapat	 (pakad)	
pahuñchi	kahā	maiñ	Allāh	ko	gawāh	kartā	
hooñ	 aur	 tum	 sab	 gawāh	 ho	 jāo	 ke	 maiñ	
bezār	hooñ	un	sab	se	jinheiñ	tum	Allāh	ke	
siwā	us	ka	sharik	thahrāte	ho.

arabicText: مِن دُونِهِۦ ۖ فَكِيدُونِى جَمِيعًۭا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ
englishTranslationText:
“Besides	Him	- therefore	all	of	you	scheme	
against	me	and	do	not	give	me	respite.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 sab	 mil	 kar	 merā	 burā	 chāho	 phir	
mujhe	mohlat	na	do

arabicText: إِنِّى تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ رَبِّى وَرَبِّكُم ۚ مَّا مِن دَآبَّةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ ءَاخِذٌۢ بِنَاصِيَتِهَآ ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
“I	 rely	 upon	 Allah,	 Who	 is	 my	 Lord	 and	
your	 Lord;	 there	 is	 not	 a	 creature	 that	
walks,	 whose	 forelock	 is	 not	 in	 His	
control;	indeed	my	 Lord	can	be	 found	 on	
the	Straight	Path.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Maiñ	 ne	 Allāh	 par	 bharosā	 kiya	 jo	 merā	
rab	hai	aur	tumhārā	Rab,	koi	chalne		wāla	
nahiñ	 jis	 ki	 choti	 us	 ke	 qabza-e-qudrat	
meiñ	na	ho	be-shak		merā	rab	sidhe	rāste	
par	miltā	hai

arabicText: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَقَدْ أَبْلَغْتُكُم مَّآ أُرْسِلْتُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَيْكُمْ ۚ وَيَسْتَخْلِفُ رَبِّى قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ وَلَا تَضُرُّونَهُۥ شَيْـًٔا ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ حَفِيظٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
“Then	 if	 you	 turn	 away,	 I	 have	 conveyed	
to	you	what	I	was	sent	with	towards	you;	
and	 my	 Lord	 will	 bring	 others	 in	 your	
stead;	 and	 you	 will	 not	 be	 able	 to	 cause	
Him	 any	 harm;	 indeed	 my	 Lord	 is	 a	
Guardian	over	all	things.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 agar	 tum	 muñh	 phero	 to	 maiñ	
tumheiñ	pahuñchā	chukā	jo	tumhāri	taraf		
lekar	 bhejā	 gayā	 aur	 merā	 rab	 tumhāri	
jagah	 auroñ	 ko	 le āaye	 ga	 aur	 tum	 us	 ka	
kuchh		na	bigād	sakoge	be-shak		merā	rab	
har	shey	par	nigehbān	hai

arabicText: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا نَجَّيْنَا هُودًۭا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحْمَةٍۢ مِّنَّا وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَذَابٍ غَلِيظٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 Our	 command	 came,	 We	
rescued	 Hud	 and	 the	 Muslims	 who	 were	
with	 him,	 by	 Our	 mercy;	 and	 We	 saved	
them	from	a	severe	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 jab	Hamārā	 ḥukm	 āyā	Ham	 ne	Hood
aur	 us	 ke	 sāth	 ke	 Musalmānoñ	 ko	 apni	
raḥmat farmā	 kar	 bachā	 liyā	 aur	 unheiñ	
sakht	‘aƶāb	se	najāt	di

arabicText: وَتِلْكَ عَادٌۭ ۖ جَحَدُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَعَصَوْا۟ رُسُلَهُۥ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَ كُلِّ جَبَّارٍ عَنِيدٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	 these	 are	 the	 A’ad	- they	 denied	 the	
signs	 of	 their	 Lord	 and	 disobeyed	 His	
Noble	 Messengers	 and	 followed	 the	
commands	of	every	stubborn	disobedient.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 yeh	 haiñ	 ke	 apne	 Rab	 ki	 Āyatoñ	 se	
munkir	 huye	 aur	 us	 ke	 Rasooloñ	 ki	 nā	
farmāni	 ki	 aur	 har	 bade	 sarkash	 hat	
dharam	ke	kahne	par	chale

arabicText: وَأُتْبِعُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا لَعْنَةًۭ وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ عَادًۭا كَفَرُوا۟ رَبَّهُمْ ۗ أَلَا بُعْدًۭا لِّعَادٍۢ قَوْمِ هُودٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	 a	 curse	 followed	 them	 in	 the	 world,	
and	 on	 the	 Day	 of	 Resurrection;	 pay	 heed!	 Indeed	 A’ad	 disbelieved	in	 their	 Lord;	 away	 with	
A’ad,	the	people	of	Hud!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	 ke	piche	lagi	is	dunyā	meiñ	l’anat	
aur	qayāmat	ke	din	sun	lo	be-shak	‘apne	Rab	se	munkir	huye	aray door	hoñ	‘Āad Hood ki	qaum.

arabicText: ۞ وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَـٰلِحًۭا ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥ ۖ هُوَ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱسْتَعْمَرَكُمْ فِيهَا فَٱسْتَغْفِرُوهُ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى قَرِيبٌۭ مُّجِيبٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	to	the	Thamud	tribe,	We	sent	their	fellow	man	Saleh;	he	said,	“O	my	people!	Worship	Allah,	
there	is	no	other	True	God	except	Him;	He	created	you	from	the	earth	and	established	you	in	it,	
so	seek	forgiveness	from	Him	and	incline	towards	Him	in	repentance;	indeed	my	Lord	is	Close,	
Acceptor	of	Prayer.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Samood ki	 taraf	 un	 ke	 ham	 qaum	 ko	 kahā:	 aey	 meri	 qaum!	 Allāh	 ko	 poojo	 us	 ke	 siwā	
tumhārā	koi	m’abood	nahiñ	us	ne	tumheiñ	zameen	se	paidā	kiya	aur	is	meiñ	tumheiñ	basāyā	to	
us	se	mu’āfi	chāho	phir	us	ki	taraf	ruju’	lāo	be-shak		merā	rab	qarib	hai	du’ā	sun	ne		wāla.

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰصَـٰلِحُ قَدْ كُنتَ فِينَا مَرْجُوًّۭا قَبْلَ هَـٰذَآ ۖ أَتَنْهَىٰنَآ أَن نَّعْبُدَ مَا يَعْبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَا وَإِنَّنَا لَفِى شَكٍّۢ مِّمَّا تَدْعُونَآ إِلَيْهِ مُرِيبٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	 “O	Saleh!	You	seemed	 very	promising	among	us,	before	 this	- What!	You	 forbid	us	
from	 worshipping	 the	 deities	 of	 our	 forefathers?	 And	 indeed	 we	 have	 fallen	 into	 a	 deeply	
intriguing	doubt	concerning	what	you	call	us	to.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Suāleh!	Is	se	pehle	to	tum	ham	meiñ	honhār	m’aloom	hote	the	kya	tum	hameñ	is	se	man’a	
karte	ho	ke	apne	bāp	dādā	ke	m’aboodoñ	ko	poojeñ	aur	be-shak		jis	bāt	ki	taraf	hameñ	bulāte	ho	
us	se	ek	bade	dhoka	dālne	wāle	shak	meiñ	haiñ

arabicText: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِن كُنتُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّى وَءَاتَىٰنِى مِنْهُ رَحْمَةًۭ فَمَن يَنصُرُنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِنْ عَصَيْتُهُۥ ۖ فَمَا تَزِيدُونَنِى غَيْرَ تَخْسِيرٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “O	 my	 people!	 What	 is	 your	
opinion	- if	 I	 am	 on	 clear	 proof	 from	 my	
Lord	 and	 He	 has	 bestowed	 upon	 me	
mercy	 from	 Him,	 so	 who	 will	 rescue	 me	
from	 Allah if	 I	 disobey	 Him?	 So	 you	 will	
not	increase	anything	for	me,	except	loss!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bolā	aey	meri	 qaum!	Bhalā	 batāo	 to	agar	
maiñ	apne	Rab	ki	taraf		se	roshan	dalil	par	
hooñ	aur	us	ne	mujhe	apne	pās	se	Raḥmat				
bakhshi	 to	 mujhe	 us	 se	 kaun	 bachāyega	
agar	maiñ	 us	 ki	 nā	farmāni	 karuñ	 to	 tum	
mujhe	siwā	nuqsān	ke	kuch	na	badhāoge

arabicText: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ هَـٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةُ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ ءَايَةًۭ فَذَرُوهَا تَأْكُلْ فِىٓ أَرْضِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍۢ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابٌۭ قَرِيبٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
. “And	 O	my	 people!	 This	is	 the	 she-camel	
of	Allah - a	sign	 for	you	- so	let	her	graze	
in	Allah’s	earth,	and	do	not	touch	her	with	
an	 evil	 intention	 for	 an	 imminent	
punishment	will	reach	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 aey	 meri	 qaum! Yeh	 Allāh	 ka	 nāqa	
(ooñtni)	hai		 tumhāre	liye	nishāni	 to	isey	
chhod	do	 ke	Allāh	 ki	zameen	meiñ	 khāye	
aur	isey	buri	tarah	hāth	na	lagānā	ke	tum	
ko	nazdik	‘aƶāb	pahuñche	gā
